oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The Memories of the First European Cosmic Ray Symposium: Łódź 1968
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Alan Watson
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Astroparticle Physics
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The origins of the series of European Cosmic-Ray Symposia are briefly described. The first meeting in the seri es, on ‘Hadronic Interactions and Extensive Air Showers’, held in Łódź, Poland in 1968, was attended by the author: some memories are recounted.
oai_dc:dc.dc:relation: ECRS (27th European Cosmic Ray Symposium) Opening; isPartOf
